QAData.question: Who won between Leicester City and Southampton on Sat, 20 Aug 2022 14:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Southampton won 2–1 over Leicester City on Sat, 20 Aug 2022 14:00:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Jonny Evans completed the most passes (86) in the match.
Mohamed Elyounoussi has the least touches (28) of any outfield player.

Che Adams was Player of the Match with a rating of 8.68.
